name: Bandit RIP: Smackdown [BETA]
description:
Bandit RIP is an online multiplayer fighting game! It's kinda like Street Fighter or Smash, but in the browser. And you use the mouse to aim and attack! Pick a character from the world of bandits and fight to the top against other players online! 

(I strongly recommend to check out Training Mode before playing online!)
  • There are 12 playable characters in the game
  • You can test out your characters in Training Mode
  • You can join the public lobby and fight against other players around the world!
  • There are private lobbies for you and your friends
  • For the fighting game fans, yes it has rollback!
  • The game also has very basic mobile support

You can also play the game at https://bandit.rip
Come discuss the game in Discord!
All game credits
